posts.title: Little bit about Arch Linux

posts.summary: For most my life with computers I have used Linux. Windows was great but I decided to use Ubuntu. I tried out all sorts of Linux distros (ie. Elementary OS, Linux Mint, etc) but none of them seemed right for me. After doing some searching around and I came to...
